title.narrative: North East Local Services Improvement Project (NELSIP)

description.narrative: The primary development objective of the project is to improve the delivery of local infrastructure services by local authorities in the Northern and Eastern Provinces of Sri Lanka in an accountable and responsive manner.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Provincial Councils and Local Government
Ministry of Provincial Councils and Regional Development
Ministry of Provincial Councils and Regional Development

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1, A.1 | Description :Maintain a Project Coordination Unit within MPCLG with staff havingskills, qualifications and experience satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1, B.3 | Description :Prepare & adopt an information disclosure policy acceptable to IDA forthe duration of the project and not amend or waive any provision of such policy without prior consent from IDA | Due Date:31-Aug-2010

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section 1, B.4 | Description :The Recipient shall: (a) not later than October 31 in each year,commencing in 2010, furnish to the Association an annual budget for implementing the PIP in the following year; | Due Date:31-Oct-2010

title.narrative: Subprojects for which arrangements for community engagement in post project sustainability and O&M are established.
